h2_title: Where to Find the Macaque Chief
h3_title: Macaque Chief Mini-Boss Fight and Guide
content: Once you get him to around half his health, he'll suddenly jump backwards in retreat, and start putting his hands together to signal mercy and defeat.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Macaque_Chief.md', within the main section titled 'Macaque Chief', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Macaque Chief' and the sub-subsection 'Macaque Chief Mini-Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Once you get him to around half his health, he'll suddenly jump backwards in retreat, and start putting his hands together to signal mercy and defeat.
